content:
Reverse Graffiti has made its way to Durban, South Africa. Four guys - Martin Pace, JP Jordaan, Stathi Kougianos and Nick Ferreira - form part of a hot creative collaboration called Dutch Ink.

Martin Pace stumbled upon the idea when researching for a college project and it has been full speed ahead ever since.
A discussion has been sparked: is it art or vandalism?
Is selective cleaning a bad thing?
title: Incredible Reverse Graffiti by Dutch Ink
author: npf_za
